TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BinaryClientFormatterSink extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSinkBase, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientFormatterSink, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink
Public Class BinaryClientFormatterSink Implements IChannelSinkBase, IClientChannelSink, IClientFormatterSink, IMessageSink

summary.span: 提供使用 的用戶端格式子 (Formatter) 接收的實作。

span.span: Provides the implementation for a client formatter sink that uses the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式器接收的功能是產生所需的標頭，並序列化訊息到資料流。The function of the formatter sink is to generate the necessary headers and serialize the message to the stream. 格式器接收之後,轉送到透過鏈結中的所有接收或呼叫。After the formatter sink, the is forwarded to all sinks in the chain through the or calls. 在這個階段訊息已序列化，並提供為參考資訊。At this stage the message has already been serialized and is provided as information only. 需要建立或修改訊息的接收必須放置在之前的格式器的接收鏈結中。Sinks that need to create or modify the message must be placed in the sink chain before the formatter. 藉由實作達成介面，可讓格式器接收的參考就會有的印象。This is easily achieved by implementing the interface, which gives the impression of having a reference to the formatter sink. 實際的格式器接收稍後可以接著放置到接收鏈結中。The real formatter sink can then be placed later in the sink chain. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`includeVersions`|指定格式器是否將包含版本資訊。Specifies whether the formatter will include versioning information. 值為`true`或`false`。Values are `true` or `false`.| > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用此物件的執行個體，不受信任的資料或透過不安全的通道是安全性風險。Using an instance of this object with untrusted data or across an unsecure channel is a security risk. 僅使用信任的資料，並透過安全的通道，請使用此物件。Use this object only with trusted data and across a secure channel. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前它會將訊息序列化格式器接收呼叫方法。The method is called by the formatter sink before it serializes the message.
